translation: n.冰淇淋
examples: (1) The boys were regaling on ice cream cones.(2) Mother knows how to make ice cream.
(1) 男孩们在美滋滋地大吃冰淇淋。(2) 母亲会做冰淇淋。

translation: n.冰岛
examples: (1) Iceland is in the far north of the world.(2) A storm was bearing down upon Iceland.
(1) 冰岛在世界的极北端。(2) 一场风暴正向冰岛逼来。

translation: n.一致；身份；特征
examples: (1) Identity of interests is the bond that unites them.(2) The police asked him to show his identity card.(3) The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.(4) He had to make his identity public.(5) The countries have kept their own distinct political and cultural identities.
(1) 利害的一致是把他们联合起来的纽带。(2) 警察让他出示身份证。(3) 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身分。(4) 他不得不公开自己的身份。(5) 这些国家保持了自己独特的政治和文化特征。（《麦克米兰英语词典》）

translation: n.确认；鉴定；识别；身份的证明
examples: (1) A line of people is formed for identification.(2) He gave a positive identification of the killer.(3) Jewellery identification is a hard job.(4) Fingerprint identification is widely used.(5) Here is my passport for identification.(6) Do you have any identification cards?
(1) 人们排成一行等待确认身份。(2) 他明确的认出了凶手。(3) 珠宝鉴定不是一件容易的工作。(4) 指纹鉴定被广泛运用。(5) 这是我证明身份的护照。(6) 你们有身份证吗？

translation: n.成语；惯用语；方言；风格；特色
examples: (1) This idiom cannot be translated literally.(2) "Let the cat out of the bag" is an idiom meaning to tell a secret by mistake.(3) He spoke in the idiom of the New England countryside.(4) I like the idiom of modern popular music.(5) It was an old building in the local idiom.
(1) 这个成语无法照字面翻译。(2) “让猫从袋子里跑出来”是惯用语，意思是无意中泄露秘密。(3) 他讲新英格兰乡下的方言。(4) 我喜欢现代流行音乐的风格。(5) 这是一座具有当地特色的古建筑。

translation: vt.忽视；不理；不顾
examples: (1) If you ignore your diet, trouble will follow.(2) I agree in principle, but we can't ignore the differences.(3) The wisest course would be to ignore it.(4) We could ignore him and go direct to the chairman, but we'd be skating on very thin ice.(5) We cannot afford to ignore their advice.
(1) 如果你忽视自己的饮食，必然会遇到麻烦(2) 我原则上同意,但我们不能忽视这些差异。(3) 上上策是不予理睬。(4) 我们可以不理会他而直接去找主席，但那样做我们就如履薄冰了。(5) 我们不能不考虑他们的劝告。

translation: adj.非法的；不合法的n.非法移民
examples: (1) The jewellery firm is just a front for their illegal trade in diamonds.(2) All protests are brutally repressed by the government as illegal.(3) Their speculative buying of grain is illegal.(4) Abortion is illegal in this country.(5) It's illegal to read people's private letters without permission.(6) The illegals couldn't be admitted by the authority.
(1) 该珠宝公司不过是进行非法的钻石交易的幌子。(2) 所有的抗议活动都遭到当局的野蛮镇压，并被宣布为非法。(3) 他们投机购买谷物是不合法的。(4) 人工流产在这个国家是不合法的。(5) 未经允许看别人的私人信件是不合法的。(6) 非法移民是不被政府认可的。

translation: n.病；疾病
examples: (1) His illness diminished his health.(2) Worry and illness had made him prematurely old.(3) A mysterious illness is affecting all the animals.(4) More than three million people suffer from severe mental illness.
(1) 疾病侵蚀了他的健康。(2) 他心事重重、 疾病缠身，落得个未老先衰。(3) 一种奇怪的疾病正在侵袭所有的动物。(4) 有超过三百万的人患有严重的精神疾病。

translation: adj.直接的；最接近的；立即的；目前的
examples: (1) The immediate cause of death is unknown.(2) He seldom expected to receive any immediate profit.(3) The evidence has no immediate bearing on the case.(4) His immediate successors fell into the same trap.(5) I have no immediate connection with him.(6) His immediate reaction was one of revulsion.(7) My immediate family consists of my son and my wife.(8) There's no post office in the immediate neighbourhood.(9) What are your plans for the immediate future?(10) This work demands your immediate attention.(11) Her arrest produced an immediate reaction from the press.(12) He insisted on immediate payment.(13) The victims need our immediate help.(14) One hundred dollars will meet my immediate needs.(15) Today's immediate problem is one of distribution of both food and income.

(1) 造成死亡的直接原因不明。(2) 他倒不一定是想从中捞到什么直接的好处。(3) 该证据与本案无直接关系。(4) 他的直接继承者也堕入了这一陷阱。(5) 我和他没有直接关系。(6) 他的直接反映是厌恶。(7) 我的最亲近的家人包括儿子和妻子。(8) 附近没有邮局。(9) 你最近有什麽计画?(10) 这件工作急需你立即处理。(11) 她被捕的事立刻在新闻界引起反应。(12) 他坚持要求对方立即付款。(13) 受害者需要我们立即的援助。(14) 一百美元可以应付我目前的需要。(15) 目前面临的紧迫问题是食物分配和收入分配问题。

translation: adv.立即；直接地conj.一 ... (就)
examples: (1) He began to look for another position immediately.(2) All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.(3) I came immediately I heard the news.
(1) 他马上开始寻找另一个职位。(2) 这个决定将被通知给所有直接有关的人。(3) 我一听到这个消息,马上就来了。

translation: n.移居；移民
examples: (1) He is talking about immigration.(2) There are strict controls on immigration into this country.(3) The increased immigration strengthened the colony.
(1) 他正在谈论移居国外的事.(2) 移民到这个国家有严格的限制。(3) 移民的增加巩固了这个殖民地。

translation: n.进口；意义；进口商品v.进口；输入
examples: (1) The government has imposed strict controls over the import of luxury goods.(2) You should grasp the import of your mother's remarks.(3) The miscellaneous expenses of import are so much!(4) It is profitable to import food.(5) Please select file to import and click OK.
(1) 政府对奢侈品的进口采取了严格的管制。(2) 你应该领会到你妈妈说话的含义。(3) 进口货物的杂费太多了！(4) 进口食品可赚钱。(5) 请选择文件输入并点击完成。

translation: n.重要；重要性
examples: (1) Character is of sovereign importance.(2) What was said was of prime importance.(3) This matter is of vital importance to us.(4) He emphasized the importance of careful driving.(5) We cannot emphasize too much the importance of learning English.
(1) 人品最为重要。(2) 说过的那件事是很重要的。(3) 这件事对我们来说至关重要。(4) 他强调小心驾驶的重要性。(5) 我们再怎样强调学英文的重要性也不为过。

translation: n.印记；印象；特征v.使 ... 有印象；影响；印刻；传送
examples: (1) Their honesty and hospitality leave an indelible impress on her life.(2) I had a chance to impress her with my efficiency and I muffed it up.(3) She impressed me as a scholar.(4) What impress you most when you go to IKEA?(5) How these mergers impress Chinese beer industry is the point of this paper.(6) If you are unable to sign, please impress your left thumbprint.(7) You must impress your seal on this official letter.
(1) 他们的诚实与好客给她一生留下了难以磨灭的印象。(2) 我本来有机会使她对我的办事效率有印象,但是我错过了这个机会。(3) 她给我留下了学者的印象。(4) 您去宜家时以下哪一项对您影响最深刻？(5) 这些并购对啤酒业绩效的影响是本文讨论的中心问题。(6) 如不能签署,请印下左拇指指模。(7) 你必须在这份公函上盖上你的。

translation: n.印象；感觉；模仿n.印迹；印刷
examples: (1) Her gentleness has given me a deep impression.(2) I am surprised you've got an unfavorable impression of him.(3) I had the impression that your boy hates school.(4) The students did some marvellous impressions of the teachers at the end-of-term party.(5) The first edition of this dictionary has an impression of 10,000 copies and the total price is 1,000,000 yuan.
(1) 她的亲切给我留下了很深的印象。(2) 我很惊讶你对他印象不佳。(3) 我感觉你的孩子不喜欢去上学。(4) 在期末联欢会上,学生惟妙惟肖地模仿起了教师。(5) 这部词典第一版印刷一万册，码洋为一百万元。

translation: vt.改善；改进；提高vi.变得更好；改进
examples: (1) Your work will get by, but try to improve it.(2) I want to improve my English.(3) Wine improves with age.(4) I hope the weather will improve before Friday.(5) His manners will improve with age.(6) This game is our baby so we want to constantly improve on it.
(1) 你的工作勉强通过了,但要设法改善它。(2) 我想提高我的英语水平。(3) 酒存放得越久越醇。(4) 我希望星期五之前天气会好转。(5) 随着年龄的增长(6) 这个游戏是我们的孩子,我们当然想持续改进它。

translation: n.英寸；少量v.慢慢移动（复）inches: 身高.
examples: (1) She shortened the shirt by an inch.(2) The candle grew down until only an inch was left.(3) There was an inch of snow on the ground.(4) They climbed the steep mountain inch by inch.(5) The car missed me by inches.(6) Our troops inched their way along the mine-filled road.(7) Negotiations between residents and developers continued to inch along.
(1) 她把衬衫截短了一英寸。(2) 蜡烛越来越短,最后只剩下一英寸了。(3) 地上积着一英寸厚的白雪。(4) 他们一点一点地攀上那座陡峭的山。(5) 那辆汽车差一点儿撞著我。(6) 我们的部队在沿着布满地雷的路上一步一步地向前挪动。(7) 居民与开发商之间的谈判正在缓慢取得进展。

translation: n.事变；事件；插曲adj.难免的；附带的
examples: (1) The serious incident along the border increased our fears of the war.(2) She couldn't erase the incident from her memory.(3) The police are connecting this incident with last week's terrorist bombing.(4) The incident put a dampener on his birthday party.(5) These diseases are incident to childhood.(6) There are many evils incident to human society.
(1) 边境上的紧张局势加重了我们对战争的忧虑。(2) 她难以忘记那次事件。(3) 警方认为这次事件和上周的恐怖分子爆炸事件有关。(4) 这件事使得他的生日晚会很扫兴。(5) 儿童易患这类疾病。(6) 人类社会有很多罪恶。

translation: vt.包括；包含；列入
examples: (1) His writings include poetry and prose.(2) The graphic arts include calligraphy and lithography.(3) Is service included in the blil?(4) Please include me in the list.(5) My job doesn't include making coffee for the boss!
(1) 他的作品包括诗和散文。(2) 平面造型艺术包括书法和平版印刷术。(3) 帐单中包含服务费吗？(4) 请把我列入名单中。(5) 为老板煮咖啡不是我份内的事！

translation: n.收入；所得；收益
examples: (1) His income is well below the average.(2) My monthly income was just over 200 pounds.(3) He needs a high income to support such a large family.(4) The money I got was a useful supplement to my ordinary income.(5) The senate was censured for income tax evasion.(6) The Inland Revenue is responsible for collecting income tax.(7) The shopkeeper feels happy at the increasing income.
(1) 他的收入大大低于平均水平。(2) 我每月的收入是200多磅。(3) 他需要有高收入才能供养得起这样一个大家庭。(4) 我得到的那笔钱是很管用的外快。(5) 这名参议员因逃避缴纳所得税而受到指责。(6) 税务局负责征收所得税。(7) 对于日益增多的收益,店老板乐开了花。

translation: adj.不正确的；错误的
examples: (1) Which of the following collocations is incorrect?(2) The statement was proven incorrect.(3) Your pronunciation is incorrect.(4) It turned out that our calculations were incorrect.
(1) 下列选项中哪一种搭配是不正确的？(2) 这种说法证明是不正确的。(3) 你的发音是错误的。(4) 结果证明我们的计算是错误的。

translation: adv.真正地；的确，确实；事实上；甚至
examples: (1) I was very glad indeed to hear the news.(2) Indeed he has a solemn face, but he is very humorous at heart.(3) I don't mind. Indeed, I am delighted to help.(4) Indeed he was a patron of culture religion.
(1) 我听到这消息的确非常高兴。(2) 他的确有一副严肃的脸孔，但内心却是很富幽默感。(3) 我不在乎。其实,我很乐意帮忙。(4) 事实上他是文化和宗教的庇护者。

translation: n.独立；自立
examples: (1) The country attained its independence in 1972.(2) The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.(3) I tried to preserve my independence.(4) This money gives me independence from my family.(5) Americans value independence， even when they're getting older.(6) I will never engage myself to one who has no manly independence.(7) A good education is only way to success and independence.
(1) 这个国家在1972年获得了独立。(2) 政府在独立的问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。(3) 我试图保持自己的独立性。(4) 这笔钱使我能离家自立了。(5) 美国人很看重自立，甚至当他们年迈已老也一样。(6) 我永远不会爱上一个没有男子气概，不能自立的人。(7) 良好的教育是通往成功与自立的唯一道路。

translation: adj.独立的；自主的；独自的；无偏见的n.无党派者；独立派人士
examples: (1) The former colonial possessions are now independent states.(2) You should learn to be independent of your parents.(3) Two independent investigators have reached virtually the same conclusions.(4) He is an independent observer.
(1) 以前的许多殖民地现已成为独立的国家。(2) 你应该学习不要依赖父母。(3) 两个调查人员各自做出的结论简直完全一致。(4) 他是位无偏见的观察者。

translation: v.指示；象征；显示；暗示，预示v.表明；指明
examples: (1) This is used to indicate the temperature of the enclosure.(2) Sword indicates the bearer to a just and generous pursuit of honor and virtue in warlike deeds.(3) My car's gas gauge indicated that there was little gas left.(4) His hesitation indicates unwillingness.(5) A signpost indicated the right road for us .
(1) 这个用来指示壳体的温度。(2) 长剑象征剑的佩有者在格斗中具备公正、宽恕的美德。(3) 我车上的汽油表显示剩下的油不多了。(4) 他的犹豫表明不愿意。(5) 一个路标为我们指明了正确的路。

translation: n.工业；产业；行业；勤勉；勤劳
examples: (1) Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry.(2) The tourist trade has become a real industry.(3) The information industry is an infant industry in our country.(4) He wants to widen his knowledge of the industry.(5) Success comes with industry.(6) Industry sometimes compensates for lack of ability.(7) His success was due to his industry.
(1) 自从原子动力问世以后，工业发生了巨大的变化。(2) 旅游业已经成为真正的产业。(3) 信息产业在我国是新兴产业。(4) 他想扩充自己在这一行业的知识。(5) 成功来自勤奋。(6) 勤勉有时可以弥补能力之不足。(7) 他由于勤劳而获得成功。

translation: v.影响；感染；在(饮料)中加烈酒n.影响力；影响；权势；势力；有影响的人(或事物)
examples: (1) Don't let me ilfnuence your decision.(2) The labour enthusiasm of the workers strongly influenced us.(3) He makes a nice drink for women by influencing orange juice.(4) His influence is on the ebb.(5) This event had a pernicious influence on society.(6) His parents no longer have any real influence over him.(7) Mr. Smith is a man of influence in this town.(8) He has extended his sphere of influence to the world of banking.(9) He is an influence for good.
(1) 不要让我影响你的决定。(2) 工人们的劳动热情极大地感染了我们。(3) 他在橘子汁里加了少量烈性酒即制成了适于女性的爽口饮料。(4) 他的影响力逐渐在衰退。(5) 这件事情对社会造成了有害的影响。(6) 他的父母对他不再有任何真正的约束力了。(7) 史密斯先生是这个镇上有权势的人物。(8) 他已把自己的势力范围扩展到金融界。(9) 他是一个发挥良好作用的人。

translation: v.通知；告诉；使熟悉；告发；赋特征于
examples: (1) If you see something suspicious, inform the police at once.(2) I wasn't informed of the decision until it was too late.(3) The UN Associations work to inform the public about the role the UN plays in global affairs.(4) His poetry is deeply informed by the experience of poverty.
(1) 你要是看到什么可疑的东西就马上通知警察。(2) 等到我得知这项决定时,已经太迟了。(3) 联合国协会致力于使公众了解联合国在全球事务中发挥的作用。(4) 他的诗歌里带有过去贫困经历的烙印。

translation: 服务台； 问讯处
examples: (1) The table used to do duty for a hotel desk.(2) You can ask at the information desk over there.(3) They often come up to the information desk and ask some questions.(4) The information office is located in the city center.
(1) 这张桌子以前曾充当旅馆服务台。(2) 你可以去那边的服务台打听。(3) 他们经常走到问讯处问一些问题。(4) 问讯处位于市中心。

translation: n.(词)首字母adj.开始的；最初的；字首的vt.签姓名的首字母于
examples: (1) This is a letter paper personalized with his initials.(2) After the initial cheers,the noise of the crowd began to die away as the group started playing.(3) We are through the initial testing period.(4) The word “hour” is pronounced without an initial aspirate.(5) She initialed a handkerchief and gave it to that young man.
(1) 这是一张有他姓名首字母的信纸。(2) 开始的欢呼声结束以后，乐队开始演奏，人们的喧闹声也随之逐渐消失。(3) 我们通过了最初的考试阶段(4) hour一词的首字母h不发送气音。(5) 她在手帕上绣上姓名的首字母，把它送给了那个年轻人。

translation: vt.伤害；损害；损伤
examples: (1) Don't injure yourself with that tool.(2) He that spare the bad injure the good.(3) It would naturally injure him in her estimation.(4) This rough life threatened to injure his health,but he didn't mind.(5) She was injured badly in the accident.(6) He injured his left hand in a fire.
(1) 不要让那工具伤害到你。(2) 饶恕了恶人，伤害了好人。(3) 那自然也会损害到她对他的评价。(4) 这种艰苦生活看来要损害他的健康，但他并不介意。(5) 她在这次意外中受到重伤。(6) 他在火灾中伤了左手。

translation: n.伤害；损害
examples: (1) She still suffers considerable discomfort from her injury.(2) He had a spinal injury in that accident.(3) The injury to their key player could be a decisive factor in the game.(4) Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them from injury.(5) It's a severe injury to my reputation.
(1) 她因那次受伤至今仍感不适。(2) 他在那次事故中脊柱受了伤。(3) 他们主力队员受伤可能是这场比赛胜负的决定性因素。(4) 摩托车手必须戴头盔保护自己免受伤害。(5) 这对我的名誉是个严重的损害。

translation: n.墨水；墨汁
examples: (1) There's an ink stain on your shirt.(2) He has run out of red ink.(3) He swore at the boy who dropped ink on the book.(4) If the ink sinks in it'll be hard to remove it.(5) These ink stains won't wash out.(6) Thick black ink like that doesn't usually wash out.(7) The boy tried to paint a picture in Indian ink.
(1) 你的衬衫上有一个墨水斑。(2) 他的红墨水用完了。(3) 他对那把墨水倒翻在书上的孩子臭骂了一顿。(4) 如果墨水渗入，要除去就很困难。(5) 这些墨迹洗不掉。(6) 那么浓黑的墨汁一般是洗不掉的。(7) 那个男孩尝试着用墨汁作一幅画。

translation: adj.内陆的；国内的adv.内陆地n.内陆
examples: (1) Chongqing in his plan is to be an inland Shanghai.(2) Sea winds that blow inland from the west are warmed by a current of warm water that flows through the Pacific Ocean.(3) We spent a week by the coast before going inland.(4) Stockell didn't get very far inland that morning.
(1) 在他的计划里，重庆要成为内陆的上海。(2) 从太平洋来的温暖的洋流使得从西吹过内陆的海风变得温暖。(3) 在去内陆前，我们在海边住了一个星期。(4) 那天早晨，斯托克并未深入内陆多远。

translation: n.客栈；小旅店
examples: (1) There was an air of romance about the old inn.(2) I intend to strike my staff at that small inn.(3) The traveller decided to lie at an inn that night.(4) My girl friend enjoys traveling through the country hailing up at the nearest inn.
(1) 这家老客栈颇有些浪漫气氛。(2) 我打算在那家客栈暂住下来。(3) 旅行者决定那天晚上在一个小旅店过夜。(4) 我的女朋友喜欢乡间旅行，夜宿就近的小旅店。

translation: adj.清白的；无害的；无辜的；无知的；天真纯洁的
examples: (1) A man is accounted innocent until he is proven guilty.(2) He was charged with murder but found innocent later.(3) It was an innocent deception, meant as a joke.(4) He declared that he was innocent.(5) Don't be so innocent as to believe everything the politicians tell you.
(1) 一个人未被证明有罪前，被视为是清白的。(2) 他被控杀人，但后来发现他是无罪的。(3) 那是个无伤大雅的骗术，开个玩笑而已。(4) 他声称自己是无罪的。(5) 别那么幼稚,以为政客说的一切都是可信的。

translation: n.昆虫；虫子；卑微的人
examples: (1) The insect bit him and drew blood from his arm.(2) A cocoon is a kind of silk covering made by an insect.(3) She stamped on the insect and killed it.(4) A locust is a kind of destructive insect.(5) He is just an insect in the company and deserves no mention.
(1) 那只昆虫叮在他的手臂上吸血。(2) 蚕茧是由昆虫制造的一种由丝组成的外包层。(3) 她踩死了一只虫子。(4) 蝗虫是一种害虫。(5) 他只是个无足轻重的人，不值一提。

translation: v.插入；嵌入n.插入物
examples: (1) She inserted the key into the lock.(2) You can insert additional pages into that book.(3) The next procedure is to insert the battery.(4) He tried to insert an advertisement in a newspaper.(5) In the pause he managed to insert a question.(6) She found an insert in the book.
(1) 她把钥匙插入锁中。(2) 你可以把附加的散页插入那本书里。(3) 接下来的步骤是装进电池。(4) 他设法将广告刊登在报纸上。(5) 他趁谈话停顿时提出了一个问题。(6) 她在那本书中找到了一个插入物。

translation: vt.坚持；坚决主张vi.坚持；强调
examples: (1) He insisted that he had done right.(2) They insist that I stay there for supper.(3) Since you insist, I must amend the letter of credit.(4) He insisted on paying for the meal.(5) I must insist on more regular hours.
(1) 他坚决认为自己做对了。(2) 他们坚决要求让我留下吃晚饭。(3) 既然你坚持，我就只好修改信用证。(4) 他坚持要付饭钱。(5) 我必须强调起居定时。

translation: v.检查；视察
examples: (1) Police were called out to keep at the airport, and inspect the arriving planes.(2) It was strange that nobody inspected my ticket before I got on the train.(3) Customs officers inspect our baggage.(4) The government sent him to inspect our school.(5) The stewards will inspect the course to see if racing is possible.
(1) 警察们被紧急召集起来去守卫机场，并对到达的飞机进行检查。(2) 很奇怪，我上火车前，竟然没有人查看我的车票。(3) 海关人员检查我们的行李。(4) 政府派他来视察我们学校。(5) 那些干事将检视赛马场看是否适宜比赛。

translation: vt.鼓舞；激发；产生；赋予...灵感vi.吸入
examples: (1) We're trying to inspire him with confidence.(2) The sight inspired him with nostalgia.(3) The failure inspired him to greater efforts.(4) You inspire me with admiration.(5) The Muse does not inspire all poets equally.(6) His best music was inspired by the memory of his mother.
(1) 我们在努力鼓舞他的自信心。(2) 这景象激起了他的怀旧之情。(3) 失败激发他作更大的努力。(4) 你使我产生爱慕之心。(5) 诗神并不一视同仁地赐予所有诗人以灵感。(6) 他最好的乐曲创作灵感来自怀念他的母亲。

translation: n.瞬间；立即adj.立即的；即时的；速成的
examples: (1) I shall be back in an instant.(2) Just for an instant I thought he was going to refuse.(3) I recognized her the instant I saw her.(4) Come here this instant!(5) I took an instant dislike to him.(6) The computer can generate instant multimedia messages.(7) I don't like to drink instant coffee.
(1) 我马上就回来。(2) 我脑中有一闪念，以为他要拒绝了。(3) 我一眼就认出是她。(4) 请马上到这里来！(5) 我一见他就不喜欢。(6) 电脑亦可产生即时的多媒体讯息。(7) 我不喜欢喝速溶咖啡。

translation: n.学院；学会；协会vt.开始；制定；创立
examples: (1) New methods of teaching foreign languages are adopted in this institute.(2) Integrity and professionalism are the two main corporate values of the Institute.(3) The UK's Securities & Investment Institute provides education and qualifications for many of these staff.(4) The police instituted an inquiry into the cause of the accident.(5) The company will institute a new payment policy.(6) Chinese Institute of Science plans to institute a new agency in the new year.(7) He is currently the head of the Ethiopian Economic Policy Research Institute, a non-profit organization that he established less than a year ago.
(1) 该学院采用新的外语教学法。(2) 诚信和专业精神是学会的两个主要机构价值观。(3) 英国证券与投资协会为许多这样的员工提供培训和资格证书。(4) 警方开始调查事故的原因。(5) 公司将实施新的薪酬政策。(6) 中国科学研究所计划在新的一年里创立一个新的机构。(7) 目前他担任衣索比亚经济政策研究学院的领导，这是他不到一年前亲自创立的非营利组织。

translation: n.制定；制度；机构；名流
examples: (1) The institution of school rules is necessary.(2) Marriage is an institution in most societies.(3) Marriage is love. Love is blind. Therefore marriage is an institution for the blind.
(1) 制定学校规则的是很有必要的。(2) 婚姻是大多数社会早已确立的制度。(3) 婚姻就是爱情,爱情是盲目的,所以婚姻是一所收容盲人的机构。

translation: v.教；命令；指导；[计] 指示
examples: (1) His uncle instructed him in French.(2) Don't instruct your secretary to say you are out when you are in.(3) It does not pertain to the young to instruct their elders.(4) Please instruct me how to do my work.(5) The customer can instruct the computer to perform financial services.
(1) 他的叔叔教他法语。(2) 不要教你的秘书在你在的时候说不在。(3) 年轻人不应该对老年人发号施令。(4) 请指导一下我如何工作。(5) 顾客可指示计算机进行金融服务。

translation: n.仪器；乐器；工具；器械v.用器械（或仪器）装备；向…提交文书
examples: (1) This instrument monitors the patient's heartbeats.(2) He can play nearly every musical instrument.(3) A plough is an instrument used for farming.(4) The hospital imported some surgical instruments.
(1) 这台仪器监听病人的心跳。(2) 他几乎能演奏每一件乐器。(3) 犁是用于耕作的工具。(4) 医院进口了一些外科器械。

translation: n.保险；保险费；安全保障
examples: (1) I am an insurance broker.(2) He works in an insurance company.(3) I have paid my car insurance.(4) He's applying for two other jobs as an insurance against not passing the interview for this one.
(1) 我是一名保险经纪人。(2) 他在一家保险公司上班。(3) 我已经交了汽车保险费。(4) 他还申请了另外两份工作，以防这份工作面试不合格。

translation: vt.保险；确保vi.买保险
examples: (1) I want to insure my residence.(2) I'd like to insure this package for 50 dollars.(3) I am insured for all risks.(4) My house is insured against fire.(5) His talent and dedication will insure his success.(6) You'll insure with the People's Insurance Company of China. I presume?
(1) 我要为自己的住宅保险。(2) 我想要这包东西保险50美元。(3) 我给自己保了综合险。(4) 我的房子保了火险。(5) 他的才气和执着将确保他成功。(6) 我想你们是在中国人民保险公司投保的吧。

translation: n.智力；理解力n.情报；情报工作；情报机关
examples: (1) She's the equal of her brother as far as intelligence is concerned.(2) His intelligence is rather limited.(3) She's not lacking in intelligence.(4) Our intelligence shows that the enemy is advancing.(5) Clearly, there was an intelligence failure.(6) The Bernauds knew that he was an officer of the Intelligence Service stationed in the Dieppe sector.
(1) 论智力，她和她哥哥不相上下。(2) 他的智力相当有限。(3) 她并不缺乏学识。(4) 我们的情报显示敌人正在向前推进。(5) 显然,情报工作出了差错。(6) 伯纳德一家都知道，他是驻扎在迪埃普一带德军情报机关的军官。

translation: vt.想要；打算；意指
examples: (1) I haven't been to the exhibition, neither do I intend to go.(2) My husband trusts me and I don't intend to break that trust(3) I've chosen the main actors and we intend to put it on next January.(4) How long do you intend to stop with the firm?(5) The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.(6) I intended to catch the early train, but I didn't get up in time.(7) That remark was intended as a joke.
(1) 我还没有看展览会,我也不想去。(2) 我的丈夫信任我,所以我不想失去这种信任(3) 我已经选好了主要演员,打算明年一月上演这出戏。(4) 你打算还为公司工作多久？(5) 那把椅子原本是为你准备的，但是被她拿走了。(6) 我本来打算赶早班的火车，但是我起晚了。(7) 那句话本来只是个玩笑。

translation: n.意图；目的；意向；打算
examples: (1) What do you think was the author's intention in this passage?(2) Acquaint him with your intention.(3) Have you heard of her intention to resign?(4) They have no intention of getting married at present.
(1) 你认为作者写这一段的用意是什麽?(2) 让他知道你的意向。(3) 你听到她打算辞职的传闻了吗？(4) 他们目前没有结婚的打算。

translation: adj.国际的；世界性的n.国际比赛
examples: (1) I think international calls are very expensive.(2) The country violated the international agreement.(3) The drug problem is international.(4) He watched the France-Scotland Rugby international.
(1) 我认为国际电话费用很高。(2) 这个国家违反了国际协议。(3) 毒品问题是世界性的。(4) 他观看了法国对苏格兰的橄榄球赛。

translation: n.因特网
examples: (1) Internet plays a very important role in modern life.(2) My brother doesn't know much about the Internet.(3) The Internet has great attraction for young people.(4) You can obtain this information on the Internet.
(1) 互联网在现代生活中发挥非常重要的作用。(2) 我哥哥对因特网所知不多。(3) 因特网对年轻人有很大的吸引力。(4) 你可以从因特网上获得这一信息。

translation: n.口译员；演绎的人；[计算机]解释程序
examples: (1) She earned her living as an interpreter.(2) She is determined to be an interpreter.(3) She was famous as an interpreter of Shakespearean roles.
(1) 她靠当译员谋生。(2) 她决心要当一名口译者。(3) 她因演绎莎士比亚戏剧角色而出名。

translation: v.打断；打扰；中断；阻碍n.[计算机]中断
examples: (1) It's not polite to interrupt a speaker.(2) The sudden noise from the next room interrupted my train of thinking.(3) I must go on, so please don't interrupt me.(4) Traffic was interrupted by the dense fog.(5) These new flats will interrupt our view of the sea.(6) When I nod my head, that's your cue to interrupt the meeting.(7) An Englishman would interrupt a war to have his afternoon tea.
(1) 打断人的谈话是不礼貌的。(2) 从隔壁房间突然传来的吵闹声打断了我的思路。(3) 我必须做下去,请不要打扰我。(4) 交通因浓雾而受阻。(5) 这些新公寓将遮住我们眺望海景的视野。(6) 我一点头，就是暗示你把会议中断。(7) 一个英国人会中断一次战争去吃他的下午茶。

translation: n.间隔；休息时间；(数学)区间；(音乐)音程
examples: (1) He comes back to see us at regular intervals.(2) The proper intervals should be maintained between vehicles.(3) The performance runs 2 hours 30 minutes including an interval.(4) These equations are interval linear equations.(5) This paper considers the nonlinear programming problem of interval parameters.
(1) 他每隔一段时间就回来看看我们。(2) 车辆之间应保持适当的间距。(3) 整个演出2小时30分,包括中间休息。(4) 该控制方程是线性区间方程组。(5) 摘要讨论了区间参数非线性规划问题。

translation: n.面谈；会见；面试；接见vt.接见；采访；对 ... 进行面试vi.面试；采访
examples: (1) How was your interview with Michigan?(2) He mentioned that problem at our interviews.(3) I think I fared quite well in the interview.(4) May I make a few preliminary remarks before we start the interview?(5) I thank you very much indeed for this interview.(6) He indicated that the interview was over.(7) In the prosecution of his duties, he had to interview people of all classes.(8) They interview people from all walks of life.(9) All the applicants were interviewed one by one.(10) I'm interviewing all this afternoon.(11) The interview overran by fifteen minutes.(12) He had a television interview with a journalist.

(1) 你跟密歇根大学的人面谈得如何?(2) 他在我们会谈时提到了那个问题。(3) 我觉得我这次面试考得不错。(4) 在我们开始面试之前，我先说几句话可以吗？(5) 我十分感谢您这次接见。(6) 他简短地说接见结束了。(7) 在履行职责的时候，他得会见各个阶级的人。(8) 他们采访各行各业的人。(9) 所有的申请者一个接着一个参加面试。(10) 今天整个下午我都要进行面试。(11) 那次采访超过规定时间十五分钟。(12) 他接受了一个记者的电视采访。

translation: vt.介绍；引进；采用；提出；提倡；放入
examples: (1) She introduced me to her friend.(2) Excuse me, may I take the opportunity to introduce myself as an interpreter?(3) Introduce new ideas into a business.(4) And it must introduce democratic reforms.(5) We will introduce legal safeguards against fraud.(6) He introduced a motion to the Congress.
(1) 她把我介绍给她的朋友。(2) 作为译员,我可以冒昧自我介绍一下吗?(3) 引进新观念于一事业。(4) 而且必须引进民主改革。(5) 我们要采取法律保护措施，制止诈骗活动。(6) 他向国会提交了一份议案。

translation: n.介绍；引进；序言；导论
examples: (1) There is an introduction about Norway in this magazine.(2) He gave us a brief introduction about his company.(3) The government saw the introduction of new technology as vital.(4) The word is a recent introduction.(5) The book's introduction is brief.(6) She read foreward and introduction soon.
(1) 这本杂志里有一篇关于挪威的介绍文章。(2) 他向我们简要地介绍了一下他的公司。(3) 政府认为引进新技术至关重要。(4) 这个词是新传来的词。(5) 该书的引言简短。(6) 她很快读完了序言和导论。

translation: n.邀请；邀请函；招待；招致，引诱
examples: (1) He made a refusal to her invitation.(2) Nobody in the office had received an invitation to the party.
(1) 他拒绝了她的邀请。(2) 在办公室里没有人收到邀请函去参加这个宴会。

translation: n.爱尔兰
examples: (1) People flooded from Ireland to America.(2) This new book deals with the troubles in Ireland.
(1) 人们自爱尔兰大举涌入美国。(2) 这本新书论述爱尔兰的纠纷。

translation: n.爱尔兰人；爱尔兰语adj.爱尔兰的
examples: (1) The Irish used to live on a diet of potatoes.(2) Irish is constitutionally recognised as the first official language of the State.(3) His native language was Brythonic, which was still somewhat similar to Archaic Irish, so Patrick soon spoke Irish as well.(4) These days, Irish history lessons are more sophisticated.(5) Now, Irish superstitions are noted around the world.
(1) 爱尔兰人过去用马铃薯作为主食。(2) 宪法规定爱尔兰语是该国第一官方语言。(3) 不利吞人语是他的母语，这种语言与古老的爱尔兰语言有一点相似，因袭，帕特里克很快就可以流利的说爱尔兰语了。(4) 这些天，爱尔兰的历史课就更加复杂了。(5) 如今爱尔兰的迷信已闻名全世界。

translation: n.熨斗；铁；刚强(复）irons: 镣铐.v.熨；烫adj.铁的；刚强的
examples: (1) The iron hissed as it pressed the wet cloth.(2) They analyzed the ore and found iron in it.(3) Tom didn't iron his shirt yesterday.(4) How can I remove the rust from the iron door?
(1) 熨斗压在湿布上时发出嘶嘶声。(2) 他们分析了矿砂,从中发现了铁。(3) 汤姆昨天没有熨衬衣。(4) 我怎样才能把铁门上的锈除掉呢？

translation: vi.进行灌溉vt.灌溉；[医]冲洗
examples: (1) They are irrigating with water.(2) We have irrigated the desert area to make it fertile.(3) They have built canals to irrigate the desert.(4) They irrigate their crops with water from this river.
(1) 他们正用水灌溉土地。(2) 我们已经灌溉了荒芜地区使它肥沃。(3) 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠。(4) 他们引这条河里的水灌溉庄稼。

translation: n.灌溉；[医]冲洗
examples: (1) Water is channelled through a series of irrigation canals.(2) We used the money to set up an irrigation project.(3) Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.(4) If not well managed, irrigation can be harmful.(5) Irrigation is important for farming.(6) Never try irrigation if the eardrum is broken.
(1) 把水引入一系列灌溉渠中。(2) 我们把钱用在兴建灌溉工程上了。(3) 干旱地区需要灌溉才能使作物生长。(4) 如果管理不善，灌溉还可能有害处。(5) 灌溉对农业是非常重要的。(6) 如果耳膜破了，千万不要尝试这种冲洗法。

translation: pron.（it的所有格)它的
examples: (1) The word here is used in its figurative sense.(2) He felt the cloth to see its quality.
(1) 此词在这儿取的是它的比喻意义。(2) 他摸摸布看它的品质。

translation: pron.它自己
examples: (1) The cat is washing itself.(2) The government made itself unpopular.(3) The house itself is not particularly to my mind, but I like its environment.
(1) 猫正在给自己洗脸。(2) 这届政府使得自己失去人心。(3) 这房子本身并不特别合我的心意，但我喜欢它周围的环境。

translation: n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石vt. 冰镇；结冰vi. 结冰adj. 冰的n. (Ice)人名；(英)艾斯；(法)伊斯
examples: The bird picked a hole in the ice with its beak.The ice cracked as I stepped onto it.The boy especially likes the ice on the cake.She ordered a strawberry ice cream.The new student feels like the other students are as cold as ice.He must ice after every workout and game for about a half hour.He asked the waiter to ice the beer for him.The next thing you must do is to ice the milk completely.The train was delayed because of ice on the line.Water will solidify into ice if you freeze it.Wesley added two more free throws to ice it.I just need to ice the cake I made for the dinner.
那鸟在冰上啄出了一个洞。我一踩冰就裂了。那个男孩特别喜欢吃蛋糕上的糖霜。她要了一份草莓冰淇淋。新同学觉得其他学生对他很冷淡。他必须在每次训练和比赛前用冰敷大约一个半小时。他让侍者为他冰镇一下啤酒。接着你必须做的是把牛奶彻底冰镇一下。火车因铁轨结冰而误点。水冷冻会结冰。韦斯利随后又命中两记罚球使比分冻结。现在我只要把为宴会准备的蛋糕挂上糖霜即可。

translation: n. 想法；主意；概念
examples: It's my idea to hold the party outside the house.It would be a good idea to go swimming in the pond.I have no idea what I plan to be when I grow up.I don't want anyone getting the wrong idea.He has some very strange ideas about education.He has some pretty strange political ideas.The idea of the game is to get all your pieces to the other side of the board.
在户外聚会是我的主意。到池塘里去游泳倒是个好主意。我不知道长大以后要干什么。我不希望任何人有所误会。他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。这个游戏的目标是要把所有的棋子全走到棋盘的另一边。

translation: conj. （表条件）如果；即使；是否；（表假设）假如n. 条件；设想
examples: Do you know if he's married?I can give you a round neckline if you prefer.If he wins and it's a big if he'll be the first Englishman to win for twenty years.She glares at me if I go near her desk.Why not,if the conditions permit.If these terms are not acceptable to you, we may suggest others.If she needs salvation, she will posit a savior.Imagine if everyone did just a few of these atonce?Here is my list.
他结婚没结婚，你知道吗？如果您喜欢我可以给您开个圆领口。假使他赢了－－是否能赢还是一大疑问－－他将是二十年来第一个获胜的英国人。我一走近她的办公桌，她就瞪我。如果条件允许，没什么不可以的。如果你对这些条件不合意，我们可提出别的条件。如果她需要救助，她就会设想一个救助者。设想一下每个人立刻做了其中的一些事情会如何。

translation: adj. 生病的；坏的；邪恶的；不吉利的adv. 不利地；恶劣地；几乎不n. 疾病；不幸n. (Ill)人名；(捷、匈)伊尔
examples: There's one bad apple for every three good ones.He was ill, but made out to be all right.These nouns refer to the feeling or expression of deep-seated ill will.The new arrangement caused a lot of ill feeling.You should not speak ill of your friend.Jim accepted that he was wrong with an ill grace.It would be mulish not to admit to a feeling of relief that Russia has accepted these changes without too much ill grace.It is better to fight for good than to rail at the ill.The world goes ill with the man who takes to drink.More unhappiness followed Mansfield when she became seriously ill.The fear of ill exceeds the ill we fear.I've never spoken ill of him in my life.You should not speak ill of your friend.

每四个苹果里就有一个坏的。他病了，但却装着没有病的样子。这些名词指根深蒂固的恶意的感情或表述。新的安排引起了许多人的不满。你不应该说你朋友的坏话。吉姆十分勉强地承认自己错了。俄罗斯已经不太勉强地接受这些改变，如果我们不承认一丝安慰，那就太顽固了。伸张正义，胜于嘲骂邪恶。爱喝酒的人将有不幸之后果。在她患重病时，不幸的事接踵而来。怕祸害比祸害本身更可怕。我这辈子从来没说过他的坏话。你不应该说你朋友的坏话。

translation: vt. 想象；猜想；臆断vi. 想象；猜想；想象起来
examples: You can imagine how surprised I was.It is hard to imagine the scale of the universe.Imagine yourself to be on a desert island.I imagine he will come tomorrow.I imagine she'll have finished her homework by seven o'clock.I can't imagine what Noah had in mind.He imagines that people don't like him, but they do.
你可以想象我是多么惊讶。很难想像宇宙有多大。设想一下你身处荒岛的情形。我料想他明天会来。我料想她会在七点之前完成作业。我猜不出挪亚脑子里想的是什么。他以为人们不喜欢他，但他们是喜欢他的。

translation: adj. 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的
examples: History chronicles important events of the past.He has made an important contribution to the company's success.It's very important to teach the children about road safety.It was one of the most important discoveries ever made.She was clearly an important person.
历史记载历代重要的事件。他对公司的成功作出了重要的贡献。把交通安全常识教给孩子们是非常重要的。这是所做出的最重大的发现之一。她显然是个有影响的人。

translation: adj. 不可能的；不可能存在的；难以忍受的；不真实的n. 不可能；不可能的事
examples: It's impossible to tell who will win the next election.It's impossible for us to finish the work in one day.
下届选举谁能获胜无法预知。我们在一天之内完成这份工作是不可能的。

translation: prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里adj. 在里面的；时髦的n. 执政者；门路；知情者n. (In)人名；(中)演(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)殷(用于名字第一节)， 因；(日)寅 (名)
examples: The telephone was in the little study on the ground floor.The books are printed in Hong Kong.They are in research of this new technique.He is a layman in economics.I invited him in for a drink.I am sorry that my room is in such a mess.She looked so beautiful in her wedding dress.You have to pay in cash.We are trying to teach mathematics in a more interesting way.We all sat around in a circle.He is not in at the moment.He opened the door and stepped in.Evan found a photography shop, went in, and talked with the clerk.She looked in the window and found a baby sleeping on the bed.The manager is in before anyone else.They are having a heated argument. You'd better not wade in.He got in bad with his roommate.The in part of the machine is very complex.He arrived in time to take the in bus.He applied for a membership in the in party.Thar kind of skirt has been in for a long time.The election made him an in.The businessman had an in with the authorities.The job itself is really boring, but it's an in to a career in publishing.

电话在底楼的小书房里。这些书在香港印刷。他们正在研究这种新工艺。他对经济学一窍不通。我邀请他进屋喝一杯。不好意思,我的房间太乱了。她穿上婚纱看起来真美。你得付现金。我们正在努力尝试着用一种有趣的方式来教数学。我们围成一圈坐在一起。这个时候他不在家。他打开门走了进去。艾凡找到一家照相馆,走进去和店员讲话。她朝窗户里看,发现有个婴儿在床上睡觉。经理在别人来之前就到了他们讨论地很激烈，你最好不要介入。他与室友相处得不好。该机器内部结构非常复杂。他来得及时,正好赶上了新开来的汽车。他申请成为当前执政党中的一员。那种式样的短裙流行了很长时间。这次选举使他成为执政者。这个生意人与当局有特殊的关系。那份工作本身真的很无聊,不过却是以后从事出版业的一块跳板。

translation: n. 增加，增长；提高vi. 增加，增大；繁殖vt. 增加，加大n. (Increase)人名；(英)英克里斯
examples: We anticipate that demand is likely to increase.Wide reading will increase your vocabulary.They have increased the price of petrol again.We must increase our output to meet demand.There was a steady increase in population.The government is alarmed by the dramatic increase in violent crime.She is taking drugs to increase her fertility.Influence will increase along with economic heft.The rent increase will hit the pockets of the poor.
我们预料需求可能增加。博览群书会增加你的词汇量。他们又提高了汽油的价格。我们必须提高产量满足需求。人口在不断增长中。政府对暴力犯罪案件的急剧增加感到担心。她为了增强她的生殖能力而在服药。影响将随着经济实力的增强而增加。租金的提高将加重穷人的负担。

translation: n. 印度（南亚国家）
examples: India was once a British colony.He worked his passage from England to India.
印度曾是英国的殖民地。他靠在船上做工赚取船费才能从英国乘船到印度。

translation: adj. 印度的；印第安人的；印第安语的n. 印度人；印第安人；印第安语
examples: No Indian ever runs an unnecessary risk.To an Indian, the owl is a symbol for bad luck!The Indian of the west is a rover of the plain.One example came from a Macusi Indian of Guyana.In the Indian name of states, some names are from generalizing the locally geographical features after Indian long-term observation.The Indian workmanship is so exquisite.It was designed in imitation of an Indian temple.Parched corn was a staple of the Indian diet.Did you hear about the Indian helicopter crash?The Indian of the west is a rover of the plain.Farmers occassionally plow up old indian relics.

没有一个印度人愿意冒无谓的危险。对印度人来说，猫头鹰是恶运的象征！西部的印第安人在大平原上过着游牧生活。其中一个例子引自圭亚那一个马库希印第安人。在印第安语州名中，有些名字是印第安人经过长期的观察后，而对当地的地理风貌进行的总结和概括。印度的手工艺果然是精致啊！它是仿照了印度的热那寺来设计的。烤玉米是印度人的主要食物。你听说印度人的直升机坠毁了么？西部的印第安人在大平原上过着游牧生活。农民偶尔能用犁翻出古老的印第安人的遗物。

translation: n. 信息，资料；知识；情报
examples: They were unable to provide much information.We are able to get the information we need from the Internet.The police haven't got enough information to catch the criminal.He gave us a very interesting piece of information.The demander instructed soldiers to wait until further information.
他们不能提供很多信息。我们可以从网上得到我们需要的信息。警方还未得到可捉拿这个罪犯的足够情报。他给我们一份很有趣的资料。指挥者命令士兵等下去,直到进一步通知。

translation: n. 里面；内部；内情；内脏adj. 里面的；内部的；秘密的adv. 在里面prep. 少于；在…之内
examples: All the inside rooms were skylighted.Maybe it is in your inside pocket.She shook it to make certain there was nothing inside.We have to play inside because it is raining.The driver behind me tried to overtake on the inside.He parked his car inside the gate.
所有里面的房间都装了天窗。它可能在你衣服里面的口袋里。她把它摇了摇，想知道里面确实没有东西。因为天下雨，我们不得不在屋里玩。我后面的驾驶员想从内车道超过我。他把车停在大门里面。

translation: adv. 代替；反而；相反
examples: I gave him advice instead of money.I made this cake specially, with brown sugar instead of white.We shouldn't look down upon them, instead we should try to help them and take more care of them.
我给了他忠告，而不是钱。我特别地以红糖代替白糖做了这个蛋糕。我们不仅不该歧视他们,反而更要多帮助、照顾他们。

translation: n. 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明
examples: The robot follows the instructions given by the computer.Under no circumstances should we neglect the quality of instruction at vocational secondary schools.We can derive pleasure, experience, and instruction from good books.I will take the medicine according to the instructions.
机器人听从计算机给出的指令。任何时候都不要忽略职业中学的教学质量问题。好书能给我们乐趣,经验和教诲。我会按说明来服药的。

translation: n. 兴趣，爱好；利息；利益；趣味；同行vt. 使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与
examples: He showed not a spark of interest in the plan.His two great interests in life are music and painting.Do you pay interest on that account?He has an interest in the company.Things of that nature do not interest me.Few teachers are able to interest their students in dull subjects that mean a lot of hard work.
他对这个计划一点不感兴趣。音乐和绘画是他生活中的两大嗜好。那种存款付给利息吗?他在这家公司拥有股份。我对那种事物不感兴趣。很少有老师能使学生对那些需要刻苦努力才能学好的枯燥学科感兴趣。

translation: adj. 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的
examples: This book is interesting.There is an interesting program on television tonight.She is an interesting person but her husband is a real nothing.Your interesting report raises several important queries.The English language has an interesting history.
这本书很有趣。今天晚上有一个有趣的电视节目。她是个很有趣的人，但是她的先生却一无是处。你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题。英语有着饶有趣味的发展历史。

translation: prep. 到…里；深入…之中；成为…状况；进入到…之内n. (Into)人名；(芬、英)因托
examples: An idea popped into his mind like a flash.Nothing will induce me to jump into the icy water.The thief broke into the house during the night.Driving into the sun, we had to shade our eyes.Three will not divide into eleven.
他头脑里突然闪过一个念头。我怎么也不会想跳进这冰冷的水里。小偷在夜间破门进入住宅。车朝着有太阳的方向开,我们只好遮挡着眼睛。三除不尽十一。

translation: vt. 发明；创造；虚构
examples: Can you tell me who invented the telephone?He always strives to invent something new.The fact was that China was the first country to invent paper.We must invent an excuse for our absence.I invent the story about the man on my way home.Don't invent an excuse.
你能告诉我是谁发明了电话？他一直努力要发明新东西。事实是中国是发明纸的第一个国家。我们必须为缺席编造一个藉口。在回家的路上，我虚构了有关那个人的故事。不要捏造借口。

translation: n. 发明；发明物；虚构；发明才能
examples: The invention of the computer marked the beginning of a new era.Necessity is the mother of invention.This story is apparently a complete invention.The whole thing is an invention of a newspaper.Your invention is very practical.The machine is his own invention.
计算机的发明标志着一个新时代的开始。需要是发明之母。这个故事显然完全是虚构的。整件事都是一家报纸虚构的。你的发明物很实用。这台机器是他自己的发明物。

translation: n. 发明家；[专利] 发明人；创造者
examples: He is no more an inventor than an engineer.Edison was famous as a great inventor.With modern Intellectual mechanics, only the IPR acquired by the first inventor of the most advanced technology was admitted in the society.
他是工程师，不是发明家。爱迪生以一位伟大的发明家而著名。在现代知识产权制度下，社会只承认和授予那个最早最先进技术发明创造者的知识产权，这个知识产权属于最先发明这项新技术的第一人。

translation: vt. 邀请，招待；招致n. 邀请
examples: I've invited the Smiths round for drinks next Friday.We invited all our relatives to the wedding.After his speech he invited questions and comments(from the audience).His policies invited widespread criticism.He is inviting his friend to dinner
我已邀请史密斯一家下周五来家中小酌。我们邀请了所有的亲戚来参加婚礼。他讲完话后请听众提出问题和意见。他的政策招致广泛的指责。他正在招待朋友吃饭。

translation: n. 岛；岛屿；安全岛；岛状物adj. 岛的vt. 孤立；使成岛状n. (Island)人名；(英)艾兰
examples: This island is accessible only by boat.This island is no longer a dependency of the USA.Cocos are everywhere in Hainan Island.The experts are exploring every part of the island.The mountainous island loomed on the horizon.The two countries had a territorial dispute over which one owned the island.
这个小岛只能坐小船去。这个小岛不再是美国的属地。海南岛上到处都是椰子树。专家们正在勘查这个岛的各个部分。那座巨大的岛屿隐隐约约浮现在地平线上。两国之间存在着涉及那个岛屿归属的领土争端。

translation: pron. [指无生命的东西、动物、植物]它；这；那pron. 指已提到或将提及的事物、活动、经验、抽象观念等pron. 在不分性别或情况不详时指代pron. 作无人称动词的主语，表示天气、时日、距离、状态、温度等等abbr. 信息技术information technology
examples: It's Friday.It irks us to wait for people who are late."Where's your car?" "It's in the garage."The baby next door kept me awake. It cried all night.There is a rosebush near the fence and it is very beautiful.
今天星期五。等候迟到的人使我们厌烦。“你的汽车在哪儿呢?”“在车库里。”隔壁的孩子吵得我睡不着觉。他整夜哭个没完篱笆附近有一丛玫瑰，长得非常美丽。

translation: adj. 意大利的；意大利语的；意大利文化的n. 意大利人；意大利语
examples: Rome is an Italian city.Italian pizza is very popular in China.If they have time, they will study italian too.I would like a guide who speaks Italian.Every Italian should rally round him.He landed a blow on the Italian's chin.I need to practise my Italian before my business trip.
罗马是意大利城市。意大利的比萨饼在中国很受欢迎。如果他们有时间，他们也会学习意大利语的。我想要一个讲意大利语的导游。每个意大利人都应团结在他的周围。他在那个意大利人的下颌上打了一拳。我出差之前需要先练习一下意大利语。

translation: n. 意大利（欧洲南部国家）
examples: Italy is a peninsula.Italy is in the south of Europe.His family emigrated from Italy to America.Modern music was first developed in Italy.They spent a week motoring through Italy.Italy is a richly historied Mediterranean country.We are touring Italy for our holidays this year.He hitched south towards Italy, and thence into France.
意大利是一个半岛。意大利在欧洲的南部。他们家从意大利移居到美国。现代音乐最初是在意大利发展起来的。他们花了一星期，驾车周游意大利。意大利是个历史悠久的地中海国家。今年我们假期要去意大利旅行。他搭乘便车往南去意大利，然后从那里进入法国。

translation: 立即，匆忙
examples: In her hurry she forgot to leave her phone number.There is no hurry to make a decision.
匆忙间她忘了留下电话号码。没有必要匆忙作出决定。

translation: 总共，合计
examples: That's 5.40 in all.We numbered 20 (ie There were 20 of us) in all.He visited, in all, ten hospitals in China.
总共5.我们共计20人。他在中国共参观了10家医院。

translation: 总之；简言之
examples: In a word, we must just leave now.In one word,we must try our best to do the job.In few words, mysteries are due to secrecy.He may be briefly characterized as a man of arts.
总而言之，我们必须现在就走。总而言之，我们必须尽力去做这项工作。简言之，隐密直似有接受秘事之权也。简言之，他的特点是多才多艺。

translation: 共同的；共有的
examples: The two sisters have nothing in common.Jane and I have nothing in common.They have something in common in this connection.In common with many others, she applied for a training place.
两姐妹没有什么共同之处。简和我毫无共同之处。在这点上，他们有些共同之处。她已和许多人一起申请参加训练。

translation: 负债；欠情
examples: Wasteful people usually end up in debt.A large number of factories operate in the red.
挥霍浪费者最后往往负债。许多工厂都是负债经营。

translation: 在危险中
examples: The eagle is eager to anger the tiger in danger.He can not shrink back from danger.
鹰渴望激怒处在危险中的老虎。他不会从危险中退缩出来。

translation: 事实上，实际上
examples: That is actually a cavity in the earth.As a matter of fact, light is a form of energy.As a matter of fact, I've never been there before.In fact the first voyage went without a hitch.
那其实是一个地下洞穴。其实，光是能的一种形式。事实上我从未到过那儿。事实上，第一次航行十分顺利。

translation: 在…前面
examples: I drove up in front of the house and honked.A still better tomorrow lies ahead of you.
我将车开到屋子前面然后按喇叭。展现在你们前面的是更加美好的未来。

translation: 需要…时
examples: We need more people of his mold.I need a piece of string to tie this parcel up.
我们需要更多他那种类型的人。我需要一根细绳把这包裹扎起来。

translation: 整齐，秩序井然；按顺序；状况良好
examples: He was as busy as a bee trying to put the house in order.Trying to keep this garden in order is the despair of my life.Please tabulate the numbers in order.The items are listed in order of importance.
他为了要把家里弄得整整齐齐，忙了好一阵子。把这个花园管理好是我力不能及的事。请把那些数字按顺序制成表。这些项目是根据其重要性排列的。

translation: 为了；以便
examples: In order not to be late, she cut across the fields.That party hack is just in politics for the money.He raised his hand in order that the taxi may stop.I'll change my timetable to fay in with yours.
为了不迟到，她抄近路穿过田野。那位政客从政的目的只是为了钱。他举起手以便使出租车停下来。我将改变时间表以便和你们的吻合起来。

translation: 为了
examples: He lit a cigarette in order to calm his mind.We started early in order to arrive before dark.She is sieving the rice in order to sieve out the stones.She stinted herself of food in order to let the children have enough.In the jungle, they were driven to extremes in order to survive.
他点燃一支香烟，镇定一下情绪。为了在天黑前到达，我们很早就动身了。她正在把米过筛，好把石头筛出。她自己省着吃，好让孩子们吃饱。在丛林中，他们为了生存被迫采取极端行动。

translation: 换句话说
examples: In other words, none of us can go to the movie.To put it in another way, I'm busy.DERRICK So in other words we're moving.In that way, Pluto acts like a comet.
换句话说，我们都不能去看电影。换句话说，我很忙。也就是说我们要搬家。也就是说，冥王星的行为像一个彗星。

translation: 和平地；安静，宁静；安祥地
examples: The old man dropped off peacefully in his sleep.Please let me get on with my work in peace and quiet.
老人在睡眠中平静地死去。请让我平静地做我的工作吧。

translation: adv. 公开地，当众
examples: Spitting in public is considered vulgar.He was arrested for exposing himself in the park.In this country people can criticize their president in public.Dorset had apparently shown marked interest in the girl.
当众吐痰被认为是粗鄙的行为。他因在公园里当众暴露生殖器而被捕。在这个国家人们可以公开地批评他们的总统。多森一向公开地显示他对那姑娘怀有特殊的好感。

translation: 惊奇地
examples: She looked up in surprise when I shouted.He caught his breath in surprise.The child's mouth formed a big O in surprise.She jerked upright in surprise.He opened his eyes wide in surprise.His eyes nearly jumped from their sockets in surprise.His brows went up in surprise.He goggled at her in surprise.
我叫喊时，她吃惊地抬起头来看。他惊奇得屏住了呼吸。那孩子惊奇得张著嘴像个大O字。她惊讶得跳了起来。他吃惊地睁大了眼睛。他惊讶得眼珠子差一点跳出来。他惊讶地竖起了眉毛。他惊奇地睁大眼睛看著她。

translation: 终于，最后
examples: In the end they reached a place of safety.Peter and Tom finally made up in the end.He added to his tally in the last minute.Give the plate a final rinse in cold water.
他们终于到达了一个安全的地方。彼特和汤姆最后和解了。他在比赛最后一分钟又得了分。将餐具放在冷水里最后冲洗一次。

translation: 及时；适时
examples: Firemen reached the house on fire in time.I intended to catch the early train, but I didn't get up in time.Disregarding all the difficulties, we arrived here in time.I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting.The car came to a halt just in time to prevent an accident.
消防队员及时赶到那幢失火的房子。我本来打算赶早班的火车，但是我起晚了。尽管有那么多困难，我们仍然及时地到达了这儿。我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。汽车及时停下，避免了一场车祸。

translation: 代替；而不是…
examples: I made this cake specially, with brown sugar instead of white.I gave him advice instead of money.The economy is shrinking instead of growing.There is a growing tendency for people to work at home instead of in offices.
我特别地以红糖代替白糖做了这个蛋糕。我给了他忠告，而不是钱。经济正在萎缩而不是在增长中。人们在家里而不是在办公室里工作的趋势日益增长。
